definition: Germany/German/abbr. for 德國|德国[De2 guo2]
to have children/to raise or bring up/to educate

sentences.english: In the teaching process of British-American Literature, the students should also be morally educated.
sentences.chinese: 在英美文學的教學過程中，應對學生進行德育教育。

sentences.english: This is a form of moral education is one important teaching.
sentences.chinese: 這是一種滲透德育的重要教學形式之一。

sentences.english: One of the limitations in traditional moral education is to be away from college students' life.
sentences.chinese: 傳統大學德育的弊端之一是脫離生活。

sentences.english: Secondly, it discusses the influences of information-based moral education in the universities.
sentences.chinese: 其次，探討了信息化條件給高校德育工作帶來的影響。

sentences.english: Sports teaching in an effective means and important approach to moral education.
sentences.chinese: 體育教學是進行德育教育的有效手段和重要途徑。

sentences.english: The fourth part of moral education in secondary vocational schools, teaching the basic principles to be followed.
sentences.chinese: 第四部分是中職學校德育課教學中應遵循的基本原則。

sentences.english: It is significant to carry out moral education in Wushu teaching.
sentences.chinese: 在武術教學中進行德育教育具有重要的意義。

sentences.english: Moral education throughout the school physical education in all aspects of the work.
sentences.chinese: 德育工作貫穿於學校體育工作中的各個方面。

sentences.english: This paper talks about the necessity of strengthening students' moral education in politics teaching.
sentences.chinese: 本文論述在思想政治課教學中應加強學生的德育教育。

sentences.english: Moral education of conversation style (MECS) is the response to the spirit of conversation in education field .
sentences.chinese: 對話式德育是時代對話精神在教育領域的迴應。

sentences.english: We combine the moral education with teaching and train our students to be highly qualified .
sentences.chinese: 我們將德育教育融入教學，培養高素質人才。

sentences.english: The traditional Chinese virtues with profound connotation are abundant resources for school moral education.
sentences.chinese: 中華傳統美德內涵豐富深厚，是學校德育的源頭活水。

sentences.english: The second part is the about the design on moral credit system.
sentences.chinese: 論文的第三部分是德育學分制的實施。

sentences.english: The ideological and political course of college self - taught class is the important moral position of college students.
sentences.chinese: 高校自考班思想政治課，是學生德育教育的重要陣地。

sentences.english: The world's highest mountain is 8,844 meters high.
sentences.chinese: 德育目標世界最高峯有8844米高。

sentences.english: The era of multi-value, which reflects the subjectivity, demands the new approaches of moral education on teenagers.
sentences.chinese: 彰顯主體性的價值多元時代呼喚青少年德育的新路向。

definition: all-round education (contrasted with 應試教育|应试教育[ying4 shi4 jiao4 yu4], exam-oriented education)
literature and language/(PRC) Chinese (as a school subject)
rule by virtue/rule by setting virtuous example (Confucian ideal)
the aims of education: morality, intelligence, physical fitness and aesthetic sense
the tone of a school/campus atmosphere
to serve as a model for others (idiom)/to be a worthy teacher
